metadata.name: vanilla dream
metadata.description: the “vanilla dream” scented candle is a luxurious and inviting fragrance that is perfect for creating a warm and cozy atmosphere in any space. the candle has a rich and creamy vanilla scent that is reminiscent of freshly baked vanilla cupcakes. as the candle burns, the delicate scent of vanilla will fill the air, creating a soothing and calming atmosphere that is perfect for winding down after a long day. the candle is made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring a long-lasting and consistent fragrance experience. light the “vanilla dream” candle to add a touch of sweetness and comfort to your home.
